data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Fa‘asaleleaga, Samoa.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Fa‘asaleleaga, Samoa
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Fa'asaleleaga unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next month in Fa‘asaleleaga, Samoa.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, teach the 2,396 believers in Fa'asaleleaga that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 10,010 people in the state of Fa'asaleleaga who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Sapapali’i
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Sapapali’i, Fa‘asaleleaga, Samoa.
Father, make bold the prophets in Fa‘asaleleaga, Samoa so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Fa'asaleleaga hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary:
the state of Fa‘asaleleaga, Samoa has a population of 12,900.

We estimate Fa'asaleleaga has 2,396 people who might know Jesus, 10,010 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 495 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 2,396 believers in Fa'asaleleaga against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
